prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Synth Pad, Piano, Pipe, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Drums, Synth Pad, Piano, and Pipe, but no Guitar.

Style 2:

Style 3:
